title: Blockchain Metrics and Indicators in Cryptocurrency Trading
abstract: arXiv:2403.00770v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: The objective of this paper is the construction of new indicators that can be useful to operate in the cryptocurrency market. These indicators are based on public data obtained from the blockchain network, specifically from the nodes that make up Bitcoin mining. Therefore, our analysis is unique to that network. The results obtained with numerical simulations of algorithmic trading and prediction via statistical models and Machine Learning demonstrate the importance of variables such as the hash rate, the difficulty of mining or the cost per transaction when it comes to trade Bitcoin assets or predict the direction of price. Variables obtained from the blockchain network will be called here blockchain metrics. The corresponding indicators (inspired by the "Hash Ribbon") perform well in locating buy signals. translated_title: 区块链指标与加密货币交易中的应用
translated_abstract: 本文旨在构建新的指标，以便在加密货币市场中进行操作。这些指标基于从区块链网络中获取的公共数据，具体来自构成比特币挖矿网络的节点。因此，我们的分析独特适用于该网络。通过算法交易和统计模型以及机器学习的数值模拟结果表明，变量如算力、挖矿难度或交易成本对于交易比特币资产或预测价格走势至关重要。从区块链网络中获得的变量将在本文中被称为区块链指标。相应的指标（灵感来自“哈希带”）在确定买入信号方面表现出色。我们的研究结果表明，此类区块链指标允许在高度竞争的市场中获得具有统计优势的信息。
tldr: 本文构建了新的区块链指标，用于在加密货币市场中进行操作，这些指标基于比特币挖矿节点的公共数据，以带有统计优势的信息来辅助交易和预测价格走势。
en_tdlr: This paper constructs new blockchain metrics for operating in the cryptocurrency market, based on public data from Bitcoin mining nodes, to assist trading and price prediction with a statistical advantage.
